message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.GT 

This paper deals with online learning and optimization, specifically in the context of bandit feedback. The paper proposes a new algorithm for this problem and analyzes its performance in terms of regret. This topic is closely related to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), information theory (cs.IT), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and game theory (cs.GT). Given the focus on learning and optimization, as well as the use of regret analysis, cs.LG and cs.IT are the most likely categories. However, the paper also discusses computational efficiency and specific action sets, which suggests relevance to cs.DS and cs.AI. Finally, the use of minimax analysis and game-theoretic concepts points towards cs.GT as a possible category.
